reviews.review_msg: Hi is very nice and his course is easy. For the project, he basically gives all the pieces of the code; if you attend the lecture you will be able to put them together. Then, it is just to write the report.
Nothing matters, just attend class and say everything that comes to your mind instantly. you project and your presentation, whatever it is, will get A+.  JUST TALK NONSENSE and you'll be fine!
Mark is a really nice professor; hilarious in the class. I found the class very helpful. You have to study the material beforehand and it would be really easy to catch up.
He is very affectionate, smart and considerate. In his course you don't get credit because of your background knowledge , but because of your attempt you invest. Loved his attitude and his class.

He is a dedicated professor and scientist. He knows a lot and is definitely genius in communication. He's really kind and cares about each of the students, not only for the course's sake but for their own future as well.
His knowledge is indeed very extensive. He cared a lot about his class and each student individually.

He is one the most knowledgeable professors I have ever seen. He explains very clean with lots of enthusiasm. Very patiently  explains the stuff over and over if necessary. Very funny and energetic. TOTALLY INSPIRING.
